ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: First and foremost, the researchers thank BCH staff and administrators without whom this research would not have been possible. Special thanks to Bob Mbabazi for his leadership at BCH and facilitation of the data collection processes. The researchers also thank IHACC research team members Jamen Kasumba, Grace Asaasira, Sabastian Twesigomwe, and Vivienne Steele for their contributions to this work. Thank you to Sally MacLachlan (University of Guelph) and Carlee Wright (University of Guelph, University of Alberta) for administrative support. The researchers are grateful to Olaf Berke (University of Guelph) for statistical consultations.
